original_text:
who does not put out his money at interest
    and does not take a bribe against the innocent.
He who does these things shall never be moved.
korean_text: 이자를 받으려고 돈을 꾸어 주지 아니하며 뇌물을 받고 무죄한 자를 해하지 아니하는 자이니 이런 일을 행하는 자는 영원히 흔들리지 아니하리이다

sentences.original_text: who does not put out his money at interest
and does not take a bribe against the innocent.
